channel.title: focus on The views expressed
channel.description: Recent content in focus on The views expressed

item.title: Now
item.description: SARS CoV-2/COVID-19 status—fully vaccinated with Pfizer-BioNTech I am … enjoying my small town as summer arrives and spirits rise in the greater Seattle area until early June … grateful for the change in pace and focus brought on by pandemic isolation my wife and our relationship … dreaming of the end of the pandemic and the life beyond find a new cadence that includes more than my pod people … reading

item.title: 20,000 feet
